channel.title: Teleport options

item.title: Teleport options
item.dc:creator: @znick55 znick55
item.description:
@znick55 wrote:

ok ill try that, thanks

you mean like this?

                [code]case 4150: // pking teleport
			if (!c.inTeleport) {
			selectOption3(c, "Teleport to", "Varrok PK", "Edge PK", "Mage bank");
			break;
			if (interfaceEffect == 7183) {
			triggerTeleport(1234, 1234);
			}
			} else {
				break;
			}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport options
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

case 4150: // pking teleport
if (!c.inTeleport) {
c.interfaceEffect = 7183;
selectOption3(c, “Teleport to”, “Varrok PK”, “Edge PK”, “Mage bank”);
break;
} else {
break;
}

then in the clicking button id’s for the 3 option packets (3 different cases)
put
if (interfaceEffect == 7183) {
triggerTeleport(varrock, pk coords);
}

etc

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport options
item.dc:creator: @znick55 znick55
item.description:
@znick55 wrote:

Ok so I was messing around with teleports and I added a simple little teleport options thing,
I know its not original but I still like it.

I cant figure out how to make it so when you click an option it teleports you…
Right now when you click something it does nothing…

Source: devolution 2.7

I couldnt find another source that used this so I couldnt rip it.

heres the case:

case 4150: // pking teleport if (!c.inTeleport) { selectOption3(c, "Teleport to", "Varrok PK", "Edge PK", "Mage bank"); break; } else { break; }

Heres what comes up when I click the teleport

Read full topic
